body:
Thanks. That shows why it's happening. For some reason you have Python27 as the first item. This should be fixed in GHPython but for now we can move ```import sys``` up as the first import and then sort sys.path by Python27 to make sure it will be moved to the bottom of the list. import sys
sys.path = sorted(sys.path, key=lambda p: p.find("Python27")) Attached file has a modified Honeybee_honeybee component. Let me know if the component executes with no issues and we can add this as part of the official release. Mostapha
